channel.title: Ilya Pantsyr's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Ilya Pantsyr's Blog

item.title: Projects
item.description: Let’s PDF An Image(s) to PDF conversion service that allows you immediately convert .img to .pdf. TGCryptoBot A Telegram Bot that shows cryptocurrency prices. Conway’s Game of Life A yet another implementation of Conway’s Game of Life. JWT Auth Demo A Fullstack JWT authentication demo application using Spring Boot, Spring Security and React on frontend (refresh token support). Spinning Donut An animated Spinning Donut.
